channel.title: Emerald Dream: Cheat client
channel.description:
Hey guys! I think this is my 2nd release on mopar evarrrr.
It's a cheat client that has exploits for TrisidiaX all versions, and all versions of InisidiaX, but it does not work for Deathlypvpz, so if you want a server with minimal exploits download Deathlypvpz by hack3r.
I used Liquid metal as a base and added a few more exploits and changed some of the interfaces! By the way its all open source so enjoy and I hope people add on to it.
It's very simple to use and theres the documented packets inclunded in the client.
ENJOY!
Download link: [url=http://uppit.com/28z7hnze7jxi/Emerald_Dream.rar]http://uppit.com/28z7hnze7jxi/Emerald_Dream.rar[/url]
MEDIA: [url=http://prntscr.com/zsrwx]http://prntscr.com/zsrwx[/url]
[url=http://prntscr.com/zsvnq]http://prntscr.com/zsvnq[/url] prints out current Client -> Server packets.
[url=http://prntscr.com/zsvuu]http://prntscr.com/zsvuu[/url] Prints out all interface button Id's. Perfect for finding more exploits
FEATURES: Web spawning, Fern spawning, Max Stats (trisidia servers only), All bones on prayer altars, infinite prayer, INVISIBILITY!, dungeoneering armor spawning, Transform into other players! ;o, spam command, Donor teleports, many more!
If you downloaded it and you like / see stuff it can be improved on please post! :)

item.dc:creator: @Kiryn Kiryn

@Kiryn wrote:

[quote=“unitypkz, post:83, topic:515537”]Guys i got that error where it says that a i dont have a file at “C:\emerald_dream_cache\maps\mapconfig.txt” and what that means is that i need a whole cache and when i go on a file called “2. Download link” it is empty so what i need is a cache and if anyone got emerald_dream_cache then plz make an download link and send it to me!
Big Thank you to the person who will do that![/quote]

actually you just need to rename the file. or rename the code. you don’t have to download anything xtra

Read full topic

It’s a cheat client that has exploits for TrisidiaX all versions, and all versions of InisidiaX, but it does not work for Deathlypvpz, so if you want a server with minimal exploits download Deathlypvpz by hack3r.

I used Liquid metal as a base and added a few more exploits and changed some of the interfaces! By the way its all open source so enjoy and I hope people add on to it.

item.title: Emerald Dream: Cheat client
item.dc:creator: @Nael Nael
item.description:
@Nael wrote:

Actually, Deathlypvpz is the easiest to make a cheat client out of. You can simply go to the “Client.java” folder and do the following:
Find the places of where the commands are, and do this. For example: if(inputString.equals("::noclip") && myPrivilege == 2) {
Change that into: if(inputString.equals("::noclip") && myPrivilege >= 0) {

If you realised, I’ve changed it from == 2 to >=0 meaning that anyone can do that command, and not just a “2” ranked or an admin. Then, you can just do that to all of the commands found there, and it takes no more than 5 minutes. Deathlypvpz is the most vulnerable source.

Read full topic

mbuzz13:

so you are saying if i just spoof the packets i would be able to spawn server sided items that i could wield?

item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

[quote=“Kiryn, post:69, topic:515537”][quote author=mbuzz13 link=topic=633793.msg4377089#msg4377089 date=1382383632]
is this client not working? I would really like to try it out, but it just gets stuck on connecting to server, and it never connects. is there a fix?
[/quote]

Its pretty outdated. With the major lack of loaders, and the effect this cheat client has, people have moved on from insidia/trisidia based servers.[/quote]all u gotta do is decompile their client and spoof the packets.

Read full topic
